title: 有勇士去YOU TU BE搬地铁站的教程回来吗
author: sunkinds
txt_content:
有勇士去YOU TU BE搬地铁站的教程回来吗
有3份+1份补充

replies.author: fraywong
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 fraywong 于 2011-4-4 13:55 编辑 

是這4個吧
How to Build a Minecart Station: Part 1/3How to Build a Minecart Station: Part 2/3
How to Build a Minecart Station: Part 3/3
How to Build a Minecart Station: Revisions

replies.author: heidada
replies.txt_content:
嘿嘿，你太幸运了，我这两天搬了好几个视频回来了呢~

replies.author: mikeztm
replies.txt_content: 那個單詞是tube,管子..電視的意思,所以是You Tube,不要分開讀...

replies.author: sunkinds
replies.txt_content: 超厉害。XDD，勇士到的显眼的地芳，然后让版主收录吧。
